title: Water regimes in selected fodder radish (Raphanus sativus) genotypes: Effects on nutritional value and in vitro ruminal dry matter degradability
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Lusanda Ncisana, Tafadzwa Mabhaudhi, Ntuthuko Raphael Mkhize, Khuliso Ravhuhali, Tlou Julius Tjelele, Melvin Kudu Nyathi, Lwando Mbambalala, Ntokozo Happy Msiza, Mpho Siennah Nzeru, Albert Thembinkosi Modi
